node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `htmlpage` ( `htmlpage_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `pagetype_nodetype` int DEFAULT NULL, `displaytype` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `page` text COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci, `parent_container` int DEFAULT NULL, `mimetype` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`htmlpage_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: htmlpage
